item.title: Ghostty
item.description: Mitchell probably doesn’t need any introduction, but when it comes specifically to the Zig community he also has has plenty of interesting content he’s published on his personal blog: Posts on Zig Internals While Ghostty, the subject of his talk, is not openly available yet, he also wrote a few devlogs about it: Ghostty Devlogs
